body: Я занимаюсь созданием коллекций и их оформлением для различных систем. Так же делаю свою тему "Ckau-Book", поддерживаю перевод интерфейса на русский новых версий Batocera/RetroBat/EmuELEC и много чего ещё. Надеюсь, с твоей поддержкой, я продолжу этим заниматься. Спасибо!

- Добавлена коллекция 3DO Interactive Multiplayer (3do) с русским описанием, обложками, логотипами, артами и видео-превью. - Формат .CHD Обновление от 31.01.23 За столько лет ядра 3DO так и не научились использовать .m3u для многодисковых игр, поэтому к логотипам решил добавить иконку дисков. Обратите внимание - в настройках многодисковых игр можно включить "NVRAM STORAGE - SHARED", это позволит использовать для них один файл сохранения. Раньше его приходилось переименовывать вручную. - Обложки намного качественнее и одного размера (500х900) - Видео 480p. - Фан-арты переделаны и лежат в своей папке. (старые в папке "fanart (OLD)") - Добавлены скриншоты для всех игр. - Для Alone in the Dark 1/2 добавлены русские манулы от "Бюро-переводов" с пк версий. - Проставлены все недостающие метаданные.63 шт (~23 гб)
You don't have to code to create your own site. Select one of available themes in the Mobirise sitebuilder. Mobile-friendly Easy setup Edit visually
You can arrange your articles with the Mobirise website design software.

You can use content blocks to arrange your articles, large texts, instructions. Combine these blocks with media blocks to add illustrations and video tutorials. You can use various content blocks to work with your text. Add quotations, lists, buttons. Select your text to change its formatting or add links. Mobirise is a simple website builder that helps you create amazing web pages without knowing any code.
Use Mobirise website building software to create multiple sites for commercial and non-profit projects.

Use Mobirise website building software to create multiple sites for commercial and non-profit projects. Themes in the Mobirise website builder offer multiple blocks: intros, sliders, galleries, forms, articles, and so on. Start a project and click on the red plus buttons to see the blocks available for your theme.

header: Shape your future web project with the Mobirise app.
body: Mobirise Website Builder creates responsive, retina and mobile friendly websites in a few clicks. Mobirise is one of the easiest website development tools available today. It also gives you the freedom to develop as many websites as you like given the fact that it is a desktop app.

How to create more items in this list?Press Enter to create a new bullet. To create an answer for a question, press Shift+Enter. Can I create sites for commerical projects?Yes, Mobirise is free for both non-profit and commercial sites. How to install more extensions?Open the main menu in the app and find the Extensions tab. Click on it to open the Extensions list. What is Mobirise Kit? Mobirise Kit is a service that provides the access to all current and new themes/extensions developed by Mobirise.  What is Code Editor?This extension allows editing the code of block in the app. Also, it's possible to add code to the head and body parts of pages.

How to create more items in this list?Press Enter to create a new bullet. To create an answer for a question, press Shift+Enter. Can I create sites for commerical projects?Yes, Mobirise is free for both non-profit and commercial sites. How to install more extensions?Open the main menu in the app and find the Extensions tab. Click on it to open the Extensions list. What is Mobirise Kit? Mobirise Kit is a service that provides the access to all current and new themes/extensions developed by Mobirise. What is Code Editor?This extension allows editing the code of block in the app. Also, it's possible to add code to the head and body parts of pages.

Click any text to edit or style it. Select text to insert a link. Click blue "Gear" icon in the top right corner to hide/show buttons, text, title and change the block background. Click red "+" in the bottom right corner to add a new block. Use the top left menu to create new pages, sites and add themes.
